name: Girisadan Homestay

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We stayed there for 3 nights and it is a beautiful place to stay. The owner and the staff are friendly and too much helpful. Capt. Singh helped us immediately when one of our flights was cancelled. He found a perfect solution. The homestay is in a quiet neighbourhood. The breakfast was delicious and a good choice was offered. We also took dinner there with other guest which was very tasty as well. The room was big, clean and very good furnished.
reviews.title: Excellent homestay

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: A bank with ATM is just nearby. We will highly recommend this homestay to everybody!!
reviews.title: Fantastic

reviews.text: Having arrived at 1:30 in the morning after a bit of a run around Capt and Mrs Singh could not have been more helpful. Our room was fantastic and the breakfast wonderful. Our only problem was that we were not staying for longer. We have already recommended Giristan to several of our friends. Thank you for your kind attention.
reviews.title: Not worth to STAY Bad ATITUDE of OWNERS.

reviews.text: Hi,
reviews.title: A great find

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I stayde in this Hotel for 2 days. Though the hotel is clean. What I noticed is the atitude of the owners is not friendly. If you are spending this much money you want to feel at home. But my advise would be better to avoid and go to professional hotels.
reviews.title: The place to stay in Jaipur!!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We have stayd 2 nights, we felt like at home withing minutes after arrival, very clean & neat, very good atmosfere, good food and freindly hospitality
reviews.title: excallent place, we will come again

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Picture in Website do not do good with the place, it is much more nicer
reviews.title: Amazing stay in Jaipur

reviews.text: Great hospitality, comfortable rooms and incredible staff. Led my Captain Singh and his lovely wife, this was truly home away from home. The food prepared fresh every day and they even had room service. The B&B is very clean, with hot water and free internet.
reviews.title: Felt very welcomed!

reviews.text: The captain even helped us to plan our trip in Rajasthan and also arranged airport pickups. If you go there ask for the wonderful driver Shakti who will drive you around for great trips in the area.
reviews.title: 5 stars! Exceptional place to stay!

reviews.text: Enjoy!!
reviews.title: A home away from home

reviews.text: I recently stayed 3 nights at Girisadan and could not have wished for a better place to spend my time in Jaipur. The accomodation was clean and comfortable. The food (not only breakfast but also evening meals) were all homemade and rich in variety. The staff and Captain and Mrs Singh were extremely helpful and welcoming, and also helped and advised me on how to make the most of my stay in Jaipur.
reviews.title: Lovely B&B, perfect for discovering Jaipur!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I would recommend this B&B to anyone thinking of going to Jaipur. I hope to plan another trip there myself in the near future!
reviews.title: I felt like I was staying with relatives! Amazing place

reviews.text: Firstly sheer procrastination has prevented me from writing a review and for that I am sorry mr +mrs singh! my wife and I were well looked after and felt like a part of the family. Infact we also had the privilege of accompanying the pair at a family bash which was unforgettable...Shakti the driver was awesome and respectful corteous and the Singhs arent out to make a quick buck out of you but are rewarded by the comments, the experiences and the people they meet after each and every trip. If anybody has any queries about this place plse feel free to email me on mrjasgill@gmail.com and Ill tell you all I know. Captain singh also made us feel very safe by also giving us tips of where to go and where not to. In India (being an Indian from UK) there are sometimes networks that work on trying to milk you for as much money as possible but that isnt the case at Girisadhan.
reviews.title: Far above expectations. Felt taken care of and loved!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Jaipur was magical and the tour just right. I would be honoured to entertain the singhs when they come to the UK...
reviews.title: Excellent Accommodation and Food; Perfect Hosts
What a great place to stay!
reviews.text: Good clean rooms at a great price. What more can you ask for?

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Girisadan was the best stay on our trip. Capt Singh and his wife were extremely friendly and welcoming. The homemade food was the best on our trip as well. It was as though we were staying with family instead of with strangers. This is the only place to stay when you are in Jaipur.
reviews.title: Home Away from Home, Best Stay on our Trip!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We stayed at Girisadan for 3 nights and were delighted by the whole experience. Our hosts were charming, attentive and full of information and suggestions to meet our needs. We used Capt Singh to plan our holiday around Agra and Rajasthan which he did most professionally. Rooms at Girisadan were good sized and clean.
reviews.title: A most memorable stay

reviews.text: We hope to return for further trips in India and will very happily stay at Girisadan again. We commend it most enthusiastically to others.
reviews.title: FABULOUS WARMTH, AMBIENCE and STAY

reviews.text: We could not have started our Rajasthan trip on a better note. Capt Singh and his wife Giri Singh were warm, welcoming, helpful, kind, jovial, attentive,and made us feel like family. Capt. Singh sat with us to plan our itinerary for the two days, made sure the driver knew the places and also suggested the shopping places for the various items my wife bought and the restaurants we ate at.. Their staff was fabulous and gave us everything we asked for (like hot chocolates for the kids or eggs poached in water), and a lot of things we did not. The rooms were large, but cosy and the entire place spotlessly clean. It was so quiet inside that it was hard to believe we were in the middle of Jaipur. The breakfast and dinner were ALL personalized and fabulously cooked. The camredarie we developed with the other guests over these delicious meals only made the experience richer, as we mingled with people from Australia to USA, with Croatia, Netherlands, Italy, Bangalore and London thrown in. A special Chrismas cake for all was a pleasant surprise, and we knew we will miss this place as we waved goodbye to Capt and Mrs. Singh who had come to see us off.
reviews.title: Very Fond memories felt like home.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We booked 5 rooms for my family and extended family. We were welcomed in a most respectful way. All rooms were comfortable, clean, quiet and spacious. We each had our own large bathroom. The food was absolutely delicious, we ate 3 breakfasts, and 3 dinners. The staff are all friendly, respectful and complete their tasks to a very high standard. There is a beautiful garden, exquisite furniture, and lovely artwork. We all felt very comfortable and looked forward to returning to our "home" after the frantic pace of Jaipur site seeing. We had in our group a baby, a teen, a young adult, middle aged, and a senior and the accommodation appealed to us all.
reviews.title: Gem in the heart of Jaipur

description: “Giri” Sanskrit for ‘Mountain’ and “Sadan” Sanskrit for ‘Home’ ensure all guests a warm and welcoming reception, in their tranquil home. Girisadan is a family run, luxuriously furnished home stay that offers all the amenities of modern living. Each guest bedroom has a spacious sit out for a hot cup of tea before the morning rush hour. A friendly atmosphere envelopes the home and soothes your frayed nerves, so you don’t have to reach out for that pack of cigarettes! The convenient location of Girisadan is ideal for the business as well as the leisure travelers, dedicated and disciplined staff is at your service – always with a smile! The home stay is within an hour’s drive to many historical townships like Samode & Chomu. You will experience the warmth and comfort of a family home where you can share your cultural and travel experiences, plan your itineraries, eat and drink together and make your visit memorable every time. With a seasoned Master Mariner – Capt. S.K. Singh at the helm of affairs, your stay with us has to be one of smooth sailing. Welcome aboard! Travelers who do not get a chance to stay with us now have a chance of enjoying our home cooked meals in our new dining hall. Book your dinner with us well in advance and have an indulgent evening.
